channel.title: Electric Eel on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Electric Eel on ZooBerry

item.title: Adelie Penguin
item.description: A recolor of the Adelie Penguin by Electric Eel with help from SilesianTomcat and APE II.

item.title: Aye-Aye
item.description: A unique animal coded by Penguinman and skinned by Electric Eel. ES recommended for optimal performance.

item.title: Chinstrap Penguin
item.description: This penguin lives in the sub-Antarctic islands. Coded by Penguinman with skins by Electric Eel.
